name: Project Zomboid B42 Community Multiplayer Patch Server EN
author: shuazi@ixovo.com
description: Project Zomboid is an open-world survival horror game developed by the British-Canadian independent game studio "The Indie Stone", currently in Beta testing phase. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic zombie-infested world during the aftermath of the Knox Event, where players must challenge themselves to survive as long as possible before inevitable death. This is a modified version of the B42 client that implements multiplayer online support for the B42 version through community-developed patches. It is recommended to use a Steam account without two-factor authentication to avoid issues with entering verification codes during installation.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/ptero-eggs/installers:debian'

## Steam Account Input Cheak.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "Steam User is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
else
    echo -e "User set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## Download and install Steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +quit

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## The Fun Starts now
cd /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y wget unzip libarchive-tools

wget -O depot.zip "${DEPOT_LINK}"
unzip depot.zip
rm -rf depot.zip

wget -O start.sh "${START_SH}"

./DepotDownloader -dir "/mnt/server" -app "${DEPOT_APPID}" -branch "${STEAM_BRANCHID}" -depot "${DEPOT_SUBID}" -manifest "${DEPOT_MANIFESTID}" -username "${STEAM_USER}" -password "${STEAM_PASS}"
chmod -R 777 ./*

wget -O B42MP.rar "${PATCH_LINK}"
bsdtar -xf B42MP.rar
mv ./b42mp/* ./projectzomboid
mv B42MP.jar ./projectzomboid
rm -R b42mp b42mp.bat .wget-hsts b42mp.sh b42serverstart.bat LICENSE LICENSE.txt B42MP.rar DepotDownloader
chmod -R 777 ./*
## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
